mapper.insert: insert into jacg_weixin_questions (id, contents, questionType, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, del, status) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contents}, #{questionType}, #{createUser.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateUser.id}, #{updateDate}, '0', '0' )
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id id, t1.contents contents, t1.questionType questionType, t1.status status
FROM `jacg_weixin_questions` t1
where t1.del!=1
and `contents` like concat('%', #{contents}, '%')

update jacg_weixin_questions t1 set t1.status = '1' where t1.id =#{idJson}
